head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CROCOLL, EDWIN JOHN, SR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CROCOLL, EDWIN JOHN, SR.

block.p: CROCOLL-Edwin John, Sr. September 6, 1997. Beloved husband Helen Sipple Crocoll. Cherished father of Edwin J., Jr. and Louise C. Loving brother of the late John W. Crocoll. Friends may call Monday and Tuesday, 2-5 and 7-9 PM, at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Avenue at 81st Street. Funeral Wednesday, September 10, at 10:30 AM. Interment Calverton National Cemetery, Long Island.
